Summarize this piece of text in 5 sentences Humans have been living in cities for a long time. Making cities livable for its inhabitants has always been a great challenge for urban planners. In a densely populated city, there is a complexity of services and activities that need to be managed. This includes managing roads, services like water, electricity, telecommunications, and so on. Smart city technology has enabled urban planners to monitor and manage these services more effectively and efficiently than before.
